data.name: descr_EditControl_ChangedLinesMarkingLineColor
data.value: Specifies color of changed lines marking line.

data.name: descr_EditControl_ShowIndentationBlockBorders
data.value: Specifies whether indentation block borders should be drawn.

data.name: System.Windows.Forms.descr_Control_TabIndex
data.value: Determines the index in the TAB order that this control will occupy.

data.name: descr_EditControl_ContextChoiceSize
data.value: Specifies size of the context choice form.

data.name: descr_EditControl_UseTabs
data.value: Specifies whether tab symbol is allowed or spaces should be used instead.

data.name: System.Windows.Forms.descr_Control_Margin
data.value: Specifies space between this control and another control's margin.

data.name: descr_EditControl_ShowContextTooltip
data.value: Specifies whether context tooltips are shown.

data.name: descr_EditControl_TransparentSelection
data.value: Specifies whether transparent selection should (WinXP style selection) be used or invers selection should be used instead (Standard text selection).

data.name: System.Windows.Forms.descr_Control_MinimumSize
data.value: Specifies the minimum size of the control.

data.name: descr_EditControl_SelectionMarginWidth
data.value: Specifies width of the selection margin area.

data.name: System.Windows.Forms.descr_Control_Font
data.value: The font used to display text in the control.

data.name: descr_EditControl_ShowVerticalSplitters
data.value: Specifies whether vertical splitters should be visible.

data.name: descr_EditControl_BookmarkTooltipBackgroundBrush
data.value: Specifies brush info for bookmark tooltip background.

data.name: System.Windows.Forms.descr_Control_CausesValidation
data.value: Indicates whether this component raises validation events.

data.name: System.Windows.Forms.descr_UserControl_AutoValidate
data.value: Indicates whether controls in the container will be automatically validated when the focus changes.

data.name: descr_EditControl_ShowIndentationGuidelines
data.value: Specifies whether indentation guidelines and block start/end highlighting should be drawn.

data.name: descr_EditControl_ConvertOnLoad
data.value: Specifies whether all new-line symbols in text should be converted to one common new-line symbol on load.

data.name: descr_EditControl_ShowBookmarkTooltip
data.value: Specifies whether bookmark tooltips are shown.

data.name: descr_EditControl_CustomWrappedLinesMarkingImage
data.value: Specifies custom image that marks wrapped lines .

data.name: descr_EditControl_AutoSize
data.value: Specifies whether autoresizing of the control is turned on.

data.name: descr_EditControl_WordWrap
data.value: Specifies whether word wrapping is enabled.

data.name: System.Windows.Forms.descr_Control_ImeMode
data.value: Determines the IME (Input Method Editor) status of the object when selected.

data.name: descr_EditControl_ShowUserMargin
data.value: Specifies whether user margin should be visible.

data.name: System.Windows.Forms.descr_Control_AccessibleDescription
data.value: The description that will be reported to accessibility clients.

data.name: System.Windows.Forms.descr_Control_Size
data.value: The size of the control in pixels.

data.name: descr_EditControl_UseXPStyle
data.value: Specifies whether XP style should be used.

data.name: System.Windows.Forms.descr_UserControl_AutoSizeMode
data.value: Specifies the mode by which the user interface element automatically resizes itself.

data.name: descr_EditControl_HorizontalSplitterPosition
data.value: Specifies position of the horizontal splitter.

data.name: descr_EditControl_AutoIndentGuideline
data.value: Specifies whether indent guideline should be automatically shown.

data.name: System.Windows.Forms.descr_Control_Cursor
data.value: The cursor that appears when the pointer moves over the control.

data.name: descr_EditControl_UserMarginBackgroundColor
data.value: Specifies BrushInfo object that is used when user margin is being drawn.

data.name: descr_EditControl_DropAllFiles
data.value: If true any file can be dropped in the EditControl.If false only files with certain extension can be dropped

data.name: descr_EditControl_BorderStyle
data.value: Specifies style of the controls border.

data.name: System.Windows.Forms.descr_Control_UseWaitCursor
data.value: When this property is true, the Cursor property of the control and its child controls is set to WaitCursor.

data.name: descr_EditControl_ContextMenuEnabled
data.value: Specifies whether context menu can be shown on right-click.

data.name: descr_EditControl_MarkWrappedLines
data.value: Specifies whether wrapped lines should be marked.

data.name: descr_EditControl_InsertDroppedFileIntoText
data.value: Specifies whether outer file dragged & dropped into Edit Control should be inserted into curent content. When set to false, current file is closed, and dropped outer file is opened.

data.name: System.Windows.Forms.descr_Control_Anchor
data.value: Defines the edges of the container to which a certain control is bound. When a control is anchored to an edge, the distance between the control's closest edge and the specified edge will remain constant.

data.name: System.Windows.Forms.descr_Control_RightToLeft
data.value: Indicates whether the component should draw right-to-left for RTL languages.

data.name: descr_EditControl_WordWrapMarginLineColor
data.value: Specifies color of line that delimits text area.

data.name: descr_EditControl_CustomLineWrappingMarkingImage
data.value: Specifies custom image that marks lines wrapping.

data.name: descr_EditControl_DefaultNewLineStyle
data.value: Specifies style of new line of the newly created stream.

data.name: descr_EditControl_ShowSelectionMargin
data.value: Specifies whether selection margin area should be visible.

data.name: descr_EditControl_ContextPromptBorderColor
data.value: Specifies color of context prompt form border. Used when UseXPSyle is set to false, otherwise 3D border is drawn.

data.name: descr_EditControl_GroupUndo
data.value: Specifies whether undo operations should be grouped.

data.name: descr_EditControl_ReadOnly
data.value: Specifies whether edit control is in readonly mode.

data.name: descr_EditControl_UserMarginTextFont
data.value: Specifies default font of user margin text.

data.name: descr_EditControl_WordWrapMarginVisible
data.value: Specifies whether word-wrap margin should be shown. It can be shown even when word-wrap is off.

data.name: System.Windows.Forms.descr_Control_Location
data.value: The coordinates of the upper-left corner of the control relative to the upper-left corner of its container.

data.name: descr_EditControl_UserMarginTextColor
data.value: Specifies default color of user margin text.

data.name: System.Windows.Forms.descr_ScrollableControl_AutoScrollMargin
data.value: The margin around controls during auto scroll.

data.name: descr_EditControl_MinSize
data.value: Specifies minimum size in autosize mode. If AutoSize mode is off, the value of this property is ignored.

data.name: descr_EditControl_SaveOnClose
data.value: Specifies whether save prompt dialog should be displayed before control is closed.

data.name: System.Windows.Forms.descr_Control_BackColor
data.value: The background color of the component.

data.name: descr_EditControl_PrintDocumentName
data.value: Specifies whether document name should be printed when page header is visible.

data.name: System.Windows.Forms.descr_Control_AccessibleName
data.value: The name that will be reported to accessibility clients.

data.name: descr_EditControl_IndentationBlockBackgroundBrush
data.value: Specifies brush info for indentation block background.

data.name: descr_EditControl_WordWrapMarginBrush
data.value: Specifies BrushInfo object that is used when area situated after text area is drawn.

data.name: descr_EditControl_ContextTooltipBorderColor
data.value: Specifies color of context tooltip form border. Used when UseXPSyle is set to false, otherwise 3D border is drawn.

data.name: descr_EditControl_MarkLineWrapping
data.value: Specifies whether lines wrapping should be marked.

data.name: System.Windows.Forms.descr_Control_Visible
data.value: Determines whether the control is visible or hidden.

data.name: System.Windows.Forms.descr_ScrollableControl_AutoScrollMinSize
data.value: The minimum logical size for the auto scroll region.

data.name: descr_EditControl_ShowVerticalScroller
data.value: Specifies whether vertical scroller can be shown.

data.name: descr_EditControl_LoadConfigFile
data.value: Specifies whether config file should be loaded. If set to false, default language is created from code.

data.name: descr_EditControl_ContextPromptBackgroundBrush
data.value: Specifies brush info for context prompt background.

data.name: System.Windows.Forms.descr_Control_MaximumSize
data.value: Specifies the maximum size of the control.

data.name: System.Windows.Forms.descr_Control_Padding
data.value: Specifies the interior spacing of a control.

data.name: System.Windows.Forms.descr_Control_BackgroundImageLayout
data.value: The background image layout used for the component.

data.name: descr_EditControl_ContextTooltipBackgroundBrush
data.value: Specifies brush info for context tooltip background.

data.name: descr_EditControl_ParsingMode
data.value: Specifies text parsing mode used by control. Parsing can be set to be accurate and slow or non-accurate and fast.

data.name: descr_EditControl_ShowOutliningTooltip
data.value: Specifies whether info about encoding is shown on the statusbar.

data.name: descr_EditControl_IndentationBlockBorderColor
data.value: Specifies color of indentation block border line.

data.name: descr_EditControl_Lines
data.value: Specifies the collection of the text lines.

data.name: System.Windows.Forms.descr_Control_Tag
data.value: User-defined data associated with the object.

data.name: System.Windows.Forms.descr_Control_Dock
data.value: Defines which borders of the control are bound to the container.

data.name: System.Windows.Forms.descr_ScrollableControl_AutoScroll
data.value: Indicates whether scroll bars automatically appear when the control contents are larger than its visible area.

data.name: System.Windows.Forms.descr_Control_DataBindings
data.value: The data bindings for the control.

data.name: descr_EditControl_ShowHorizontalScroller
data.value: Specifies whether horizontal scroller can be shown.

data.name: descr_EditControl_Text
data.value: Specifies editable text of the control.

data.name: descr_EditControl_BookmarkTooltipBorderColor
data.value: Specifies color of bookmark tooltip form border. Used when UseXPSyle is set to false, otherwise 3D border is drawn.

data.name: descr_EditControl_TextAreaWidth
data.value: Specifies width of the word-wrap margin. To make word-wrap margin visible you should set WordWrapMarginVisible property to true.

data.name: descr_EditControl_BottomVerticalSplitterPosition
data.value: Specifies position of the bottom vertical splitter.

data.name: descr_EditControl_OnlyHighlightMatchingBraces
data.value: Specifies whether only start and end of the block should be highlighted or guideline should be drawn either.

data.name: descr_EditControl_TopVerticalSplitterPosition
data.value: Specifies position of the top vertical splitter.

data.name: descr_EditControl_BackgroundColor
data.value: Specifies background fill style and color.

data.name: descr_EditControl_ShowLineNumbers
data.value: Specifies whether line numbers should be shown.

data.name: descr_EditControl_SharedFileMode
data.value: Specifies whether entire file should be loaded into the memory (so file will be loaded in shared access mode), or it should be loaded just partially with exclusive access.

data.name: System.Windows.Forms.descr_Control_AccessibleRole
data.value: The role that will be reported to accessibility clients.

data.name: descr_EditControl_MarkChangedLines
data.value: Specifies whether changed lines should be marked.

data.name: descr_EditControl_ShowIndicatorMargin
data.value: Specifies whether bookmarks and indicator margin should be visible.

data.name: descr_EditControl_VirtualSpaceMode
data.value: Specifies whether virtual space mode is enabled.

data.name: descr_EditControl_AutoCompleteSingleLexem
data.value: Specifies whether context choice list gets autocompleted when single lexem remains in the list.

data.name: descr_EditControl_PrintPageNumber
data.value: Specifies whether page number should be printed when page footer is visible.

data.name: System.Windows.Forms.descr_Control_Enabled
data.value: Indicates whether the control is enabled.

data.name: descr_EditControl_UserMarginBorderColor
data.value: Specifies color of user margin border.

data.name: descr_EditControl_SingleLineMode
data.value: Specifies whether single line mode is enabled.

data.name: descr_EditControl_WhiteSpaceIndicators
data.value: Specifies options of White space mode.

data.name: System.Windows.Forms.descr_Control_BackgroundImage
data.value: The background image used for the control.

data.name: descr_EditControl_ContextChoiceBorderColor
data.value: Specifies color of context choice form border. Used when UseXPSyle is set to false, otherwise 3D border is drawn.

data.name: descr_EditControl_WordWrapMarginLineStyle
data.value: Specifies style of line that is drawn at the border of the word-wrap margin.

data.name: descr_EditControl_TransferFocusOnTab
data.value: Specifies whether control should transfer focus to the next control when user presses tab key, or it should insert tab symbol instead.

data.name: descr_EditControl_ShowOutliningCollapsers
data.value: Specifies whether outlining collapsers should be visible.

data.name: System.Windows.Forms.descr_Control_ForeColor
data.value: The foreground color of this component, which is used to display text.

data.name: descr_EditControl_ShowColumnGuides
data.value: Specifies whether column guides should be drawn.

data.name: descr_EditControl_ClearStaticDataOnDispose
data.value: Specifies whether static data should be cleared on dispose. Frees memory, but impairs time of next loading of EditControl.

data.name: descr_EditControl_VisualColumn
data.value: Specifies virtual column. Virtual column is visual position of character on the screen.

data.name: descr_EditControl_IndentLineColor
data.value: Specifes color of the block indentation line.

data.name: System.Windows.Forms.descr_Control_ContextMenuStrip
data.value: The shortcut menu to display when the user right-clicks the control.

data.name: descr_EditControl_IndentationBlockBorderStyle
data.value: Specifies style of indentation block border line.

data.name: descr_EditControl_ShowHorizontalSplitters
data.value: Specifies whether horizontal splitters should be visible.

data.name: descr_EditControl_UseTabStops
data.value: Specifies whether tab stops should be used.

data.name: descr_EditControl_AllowDrop
data.value: Specifies whether drag and drop operations are allowed for control.

data.name: descr_EditControl_ShowWhitespaces
data.value: Specifies whether whitespaces should be shown as special symbols.

data.name: descr_EditControl_ContextPromptCustomSize
data.value: Specifies custom size of the context prompt dropdown. The specified value is used only if UseCustomSizeContextPrompt is set to true.

data.name: descr_EditControl_PageHeaderAndFooterVisible
data.value: Specifies whether page header and footer should be printed.

data.name: descr_EditControl_IndentBlockHighlightingColor
data.value: Specifes color used for highlighting indented block start and end.

data.name: descr_EditControl_UseCustomSizeContextPrompt
data.value: Indicates whether custom context promt size should be used.

data.name: System.Windows.Forms.descr_Control_TabStop
data.value: Indicates whether the user can use the TAB key to give focus to the control.

data.name: descr_EditControl_ColumnGuidesMeasuringFont
data.value: Specifies font that is used while measuring position of column guides.

data.name: descr_EditControl_ContextPromptBeforeOpen
data.value: Occurs when context prompt window is about to open. User can cancel it.

data.name: System.Windows.Forms.descr_Control_MouseDoubleClick
data.value: Occurs when the control is double clicked by the mouse.

data.name: System.Windows.Forms.descr_Control_ControlAdded
data.value: Occurs when a control is added to this control.

data.name: descr_EditControl_OutliningTooltipClose
data.value: Occurs when oulining tooltip is closed.

data.name: System.Windows.Forms.descr_Control_DragDrop
data.value: Occurs when a drag-and-drop operation is completed.

data.value: Occurs when the control is validating.

data.name: System.Windows.Forms.descr_Control_DoubleClick
data.value: Occurs when the component is double-clicked.

data.value: Occurs when context prompt item has been selected.

data.value: Occurs when text of template member is to be changed.

data.value: Occurs when edited stream is about to be closed and changes should be saved.

data.name: descr_EditControl_OutliningTooltipBeforePopup
data.value: Occurs when oulining tooltip is about to be shown.

data.name: descr_EditControl_ContextChoiceBeforeOpen
data.value: Occurs when context choice window is about to open. User can cancel context choice window.

data.value: Occurs whenever the user control loads.

data.name: descr_EditControl_ContextPromptOpen
data.value: Occurs when context prompt has been opened.

data.name: System.Windows.Forms.descr_Control_ControlRemoved
data.value: Occurs when a control is removed from this control.

data.name: System.Windows.Forms.descr_Control_QueryContinueDrag
data.value: Occurs when the mouse drags an item. The system requests whether the drag-and-drop operation should be allowed to continue.

data.value: Occurs when the AutoSize property has changed.

data.value: Occurs when the user moves the scroll box.

data.name: descr_EditControl_MenuFill
data.value: Occurs when context menu is about to open. User can handle this event to add custom menu items.

data.name: System.Windows.Forms.descr_Control_KeyUp
data.value: Occurs when a key is released.

data.name: descr_EditControl_SaveFileWithDataLoss
data.value: Occurs when user tries to save file with data loosing.

data.value: Event raised when the value of the TabIndex property is changed.

data.value: Occurs when the control is about to lay out its contents.

data.value: Occurs when context choice window has been closed.

data.value: Occurs when the Padding property has changed.

data.name: System.Windows.Forms.descr_Control_Move
data.value: Occurs when a control is moved.

data.name: System.Windows.Forms.descr_Control_MouseUp
data.value: Occurs when the mouse pointer is over the component and a mouse button is released.

data.name: System.Windows.Forms.descr_Control_MouseMove
data.value: Occurs when the mouse pointer is moved over the component.

data.name: descr_EditControl_CursorPositionChanged
data.value: Occurs when cursors position has been changed.

data.name: descr_EditControl_LanguageChanged
data.value: Occurs when current language of the control has been changed.

data.name: descr_EditControl_DrawUserMarginText
data.value: Occurs when user margin area text is ready to be drawn.

data.name: System.Windows.Forms.descr_Control_FontChanged
data.value: Event raised when the value of the Font property is changed on Control.

data.name: descr_EditControl_ContextChoiceItemSelected
data.value: Occurs when context choice item has been selected.
